translations: adv.缺乏幽默感地；一本正经地

sentences.sentence: He laughed humorlessly, "Nakuru is not a European city."
sentences.translation: 他毫无幽默感地笑着说:“纳库鲁不是一个欧洲城市。”

sentences.sentence: He laughed humorlessly. " nakuru is not a european city. it has two million kenyans and less than twenty thousand whites."
sentences.translation: 他干笑了几声： 「纳库鲁可不是个欧洲城市。那里居住的是两百万的肯尼亚公民，而白人还不到两万。 」
